Boynton Beach.Coral Square: Coral Square is an enclosed shopping mall in Coral Springs, Florida in central Metropolitan Miami. Like Miami International Mall, it was built by the Edward J. DeBartolo Corporation in 1983, and is currently owned and managed by Simon Property Group. The mall also has about 120 shops and eateries, located on University Drive like Westfield Broward, and named after the city like Pembroke Lakes Mall, Pompano Citi Centre, and Galleria Fort Lauderdale.
